ProductInfo.Features:
4th Generation Intel Core i7-4700MQ Processor (2.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache); Genuine Windows® 8 64
1144GB Dual Hard Drive Configuration: 120GB Primary Solid State Disk (SSD) + 1TB 5400RPM Secondary Hard Drive with HP ProtectSmart Protection
15.6-inch diagonal Full HD BrightView LED-backlit Display (1920x1080); 8GB DDR3L 1600MHz RAM (2 Dimm); 6 Cell Battery
NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M Graphics with 2048MB of dedicated video memory ; Integrated Intel 802.11b/g/n (2x2); Bluetooth; Intel Smart Connect Technology plus WiDi support
Backlit Keyboard; Beats Audio with 4 Speakers; 4 SuperSpeed USB 3.0; 1 HDMI; 1 RJ45;Fingerprint Reader; 1 Year HP Warranty
